free: #e On the mountain, there is a farmer.
#c 有一個山上的農人。
#e And then there is a boy on his fields.
#c 然後，有一個男生在那個人的田。
#e He went up to the pomelos cultivated by him.
#c 他爬上他所種的柚子樹。
#n izuk 可以是橘子、柚子等芸香科植物。
#e He kept on plucking the fruit.
#c 一直採果子。
#e He put them in the bag meant for packaging.
#c 被他放在專門裝的布袋。
#e He put them down in the basket.
#c 他放下在籃子裡。
#e Then there are the pomelos plucked by him, dropped on the ground.
#c 有那個掉下來、被他採收的柚子。
#e He wiped off the dust.
#c 他擦一下灰塵。
#e He put the pomelos he collected in the basket.
#c 他把所採的柚子放在籃子。
#e A person who is rearing a goat passes by with it.
#c 來了一個養羊的人，牽著羊經過。
#e The goat wants to go back to eat the pomelos that had been plucked and put inside the basket.
#c 山羊想回去吃採下放在籃子裡的柚子。
#e But it is pulled away by his master.
#c 可是主人拉走牠。

gloss: 今天=改變狀態=遠距.斜格

free: #e Later,  a boy rides a bike over here.
#c 之後，一個男生騎著腳踏車過來。
#e He gets to where the baskets with pomelos are.
#c 他到了放了柚子的籃子那邊。
#e The child rests and looks around.
#c 小朋友停下來，東看西望。
#e He sees the tangerine guy up in the tree.
#c 他看到柚子的主人在樹上。
#e Then he thinks he will steal one to eat.
#c 然後他想要偷吃一個。
#e Because he sees the tangerine farmer who doesn’t see him.
#c 因為他看到柚子的主人看不到他。
#e He even thinks about stealing a basket of pomelos.
#c 他甚至想偷一籃的柚子。
#e Then he adjusts his bike and puts a basket of pomelos on his bike.
#c 然後他弄好他的單車，把一籃子的柚子放在單車上。
#e He stole it for the time being and rides his bike away.
#c 他暫且那樣偷了，騎著單車走了。
#e When he rides on the bike with the pomelos on his back, he meets a girl who also rides a bike.
#c 當他騎單車背著柚子的時候，他遇到一個也騎著單車的小姐。
#n mapalanduu=ik hanitu 我碰到鬼
#e They bumped into each other roughly, and his hat was dropped off.
#c 他們互相擦撞，他的帽子飛了。
#n cilangkulan、cibiskav 擦到，然後脫離了
#e He looked back, knowing nothing about the stone ahead.
#c 他回頭看一眼，不知道前面有個石頭。
#n kakiiv 最後，遺囑、makakiiv 說遺言
#e The bicycle hit the stone on the wheel. Then he fell off his bike, and the pomelos were spilt out.
#c 車輪撞上了（石頭），然後那個時候他倒了，柚子也散出來了。
#n paptuh=ik mas sinbalung 我撞到牆
#e He scratched his foot.
#c 他的腳也撞破皮了在石頭上。
#n mulanglang 皮開肉綻

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格
free: #e Fortunately, three kids in the street saw him tripping over himself then. They went helping him.
#c 幸好有三個孩子那時候在路邊看到他跌倒而去幫忙。
#n i 表示後面還有話，而且通常是順著語氣。
#n indi-un=ku izuk=a
#e Picking up pomelos, two moved the basket onto the bike.
#c 兩個人撿起柚子，一起把籃子搬上單車
#n kai- 有搬的意思 ka-則是抓的意思
#e The kid put the stone away the street.
#c 孩子把石頭移到路邊。

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格

free: #e He might hurt his foot because he fell roughly.
#c 腳可能很痛因為跌倒時撞得很嚴重。
#n pis’aika’aika 一跛一跛。upa < aupa。adiia [uvaaz=a  taininghaiu=s izuk]=a hai、taininghaiu a Talum=a mas izuk=cia.、taininghaiu a Talum=cia mas izuk=a.
#e Yet one of the three kids saw his hat and called him by whistling, and then took the hat back to him.
#c 但是那三個孩子中的一個看到他的帽子在路邊， 吹口哨叫他，把帽子拿給她。

gloss: 主焦-使役-前進-處格.中距
可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格

free: #e He walked along and return the hat to its owner, the kid who had stolen the pomelos.
#c 他就跟過去把帽子還給他的主人，那個偷柚子的孩子。
#e He got three pomelos. Each of them got one to eat because they were three walking in a row.
#c 他得到三個柚子，他們要一人吃一個因為他們有三個人同行。
#n satasa saikin izuk=cia 我只有一個橘子、sadudusa 各兩個、minka-tau 三個一起做
#e Then they shared one for each.
#c 然後他們一人分了一個。
#n pahusilan 的話... pahusilan=ku uvaaz=a LF是 recipient
#e because they walk along the road heading to the harvester.
#c 因為他們沿路朝著收柚子的男人那邊走。
#e They were walking and eating the pomelos.
#c 那個柚子他們邊走邊吃。
#e Then the tangerine harvester went down.
#c 然後那個採收柚子的人下來。
#e When he was taking the basket to fill it,
#c 他拿起來要放在籃子的時候，
#e He startled: why did a basket of pomelos...
#c 他嚇了一跳：為什麼一籃柚子就...
#e Because two of these three basket ware to get full.
#c 因為三個籃子中的兩個要滿了。
#n 116.自我修正中。upa < aupa。tau tu kalala 三籃的什麼。tau a kalala 籃子三個。
#e What? One of the basket getting full disappeared.
#c 欸？那個要滿的籃子一個不見了。
#e Meanwhile the three kids were passing by, eating pomelos that were likely taken from the basket.
#c 剛好那時候三個孩子經過，邊吃他所採的柚子一樣放在籃子吃著好像從籃子裡拿的柚子。
#e He wondered by himself how had this thing about work happened.
#c 你們自己去想了，這個工作的事是怎麼一回事？
